issues.description: Dark mode not implemented despite colors defined

screen_reader.notes: Manual testing required with VoiceOver and TalkBack

touch_targets.notes: Button components meet minimum (48pt). Need to verify all TouchableOpacity elements.

contrast.notes: Need to verify all color combinations with contrast checker tool

dynamic_type.notes: No font scaling support detected. Need to test with iOS/Android accessibility settings.

manual_tests_required.instructions: Enable VoiceOver in Settings → Accessibility. Navigate through all 5 screens. Verify all interactive elements are labeled and reading order is logical.
manual_tests_required.expected: All buttons, inputs, and links should be announced with clear labels

manual_tests_required.instructions: Enable TalkBack in Settings → Accessibility. Navigate through all 5 screens. Verify all interactive elements are labeled.
manual_tests_required.expected: All buttons, inputs, and links should be announced

manual_tests_required.instructions: Measure all interactive elements. iOS minimum: 44pt × 44pt. Android minimum: 48dp × 48dp.
manual_tests_required.expected: All buttons and touchable elements meet minimum sizes

manual_tests_required.instructions: Use contrast checker (e.g., WebAIM). Test all text and UI elements. Text: 4.5:1, UI: 3:1 for WCAG AA.
manual_tests_required.expected: All color combinations pass WCAG AA

manual_tests_required.instructions: Settings → Display & Brightness → Text Size. Increase text size to maximum. Verify all text scales properly.
manual_tests_required.expected: Text scales without overflow or layout breaking

manual_tests_required.instructions: Settings → Display → Font size. Increase to maximum. Verify text scales.

axe_core_setup.notes: Optional: Install axe-core for automated testing. Manual testing is primary method for Phase 01.

instructions.step_2: Run manual tests (VoiceOver, TalkBack, touch targets, contrast)
instructions.step_3: Update compliance status for each category
instructions.step_4: Add any additional issues discovered during testing
